messages.messageBody:
I've just started my research into the samurai about two months ago. For some reason I have found a great attraction to the subject. However, I would like some assistance in expounding my knowledge of the people. I've read Mushasi's book and I'm now reading "Hagakuri." Thanks for any feedback.

Amir
